price: 6. Dia memasukkan malam ke dalam siang dan memasukkan siang ke dalam malam. Dan Dia Maha Mengetahui segala isi hati.
arabic: يُولِجُ ٱلَّيۡلَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِۚ وَهُوَ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yūliju al-layla fī al-nahāri wayūliju al-nahāra fī al-layli wahuwa ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
translations: of what is in the breasts
of what is in the breasts
